bibl.title: Tax Documents from Theadelphia. Papyri of the Second Century A.D.
bibl.seg: Day John and Clinton Walker Keyes, Tax Documents from Theadelphia. Papyri of the Second Century A.D. (Columbia Papyri. Greek Series. V.)
New York, Columbia University Press, 1956, 4°, xviii-342 pp. et 2 pll.

C.R. par Adelmo Barigazzi, Athenaeum N.S., 35 (1957) pp. 370-371. - Harold I. Bell, CR N.S., 8 (1958) pp. 62-63. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 36 (1956) p. 127. - Jean Gaudemet, RD 4e s., 37 (1959) pp. 222-223. - Hans Gerstinger, AnzAW 12 (1959) coll. 41-46. - Naphtali Lewis, CP 53 (1958) p. 139. - Giuseppe Ignazio Luzzatto, SDHA 23 (1957) pp. 391-396. - Paul Mertens, RBPhil 37 (1959) pp. 777-781. - Ernst Meyer, MusHelv 15 (1958) pp. 249-250. - J.F. Pomar, Emerita 25 (1957) pp. 508-509. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 33 (1958) No. 65, pp. 145-150. - Roger Rémondon, RPhil 3e s., 32 (1958) pp. 142-144. - J.E. Seaver, AHR 62 (1956-1957) pp. 656-657. - Eric G. Turner, JHS 78 (1958) p. 146. - B.A. van Groningen, Mnemosyne 4a s., 10 (1957) pp. 263-264. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 74 (1957) pp. 418-420. - Friedrich Zucker, GGA 211 (1957) pp. 59-72.
